Description.Chinese: 停火持续 45 分钟而不是 2 小时（在原版中，请求与海盗停火的冷却时间为 60 分钟 - >至少 15 分钟的战争）。只有90分钟的非攻击协议，而不是5小时。这个模组已经包含在我的强盗模组中。
Description.English: CeaseFire lasts 45 minutes instead of 2 hours (in vanilla the cooldown for RequestCeaseFire with Pirates is 60 minutes -> at least 15 minutes war). Only 90 minutes Non-Attack-agreement, instead of 5 hours. This mod is already included in my Stronger Pirates Mod.
Description.French: CeaseFire lasts 45 minutes instead of 2 hours (in vanilla the cooldown for RequestCeaseFire with Pirates is 60 minutes -> at least 15 minutes war). Only 90 minutes Non-Attack-agreement, instead of 5 hours. This mod is already included in my Stronger Pirates Mod.
Description.German: Waffenstillstand dauert nur noch 45 Minuten anstatt 2 Stunden (vanilla 60 Minuten Cooldown für Anfrage für erneuten Waffenstillstand mit Piraten -> mindestens 15 Minuten Krieg). Nur noch 90 Minuten Nicht-Angriffs-Pakt, anstatt 5 Stunden. Dieser Mod ist in meinem Stronger Pirates Mod enthalten.
